AUTO SHIPMENT

Car shipping at its best!

We are here to help 24/7. Call us at (865) 381-8015 for your custom car shipping quote.

Easy Steps

1

Quote & Order

Get a quote and Place an order Receive a custom quote that's designed to meet your car shipping needs and budget by calling (865) 381-8015 or clicking on the “Get a Quote” button. If you're happy with the estimate for shipping your car, you can finalize your order either by ordering online or speaking with one of our car shipping experts.

2

Schedule Pickup

Schedule Pickup Our car shipping experts will take care of everything and schedule a pickup date, time, and location that is convenient for you. On the day of pick up, both the trucker and you will inspect your vehicle and sign a Bill of Lading. Then you can kiss goodbye, pack your bags, and let us take care of the rest. During transit, our experts will give you regular updates on your vehicle shipment.

3

Receive your vehicle

Receive your vehicle It's a reunion Day, a day we expect the most here at Albatross Auto Shipping. Upon delivery, the driver will call you to schedule a drop-off time and place of your choice. Once you receive your vehicle, you and the driver conduct a final vehicle inspection to make sure it was delivered safely and then sign off a BOL. And that's it! Just like that, you receive your vehicle hassle-free.

Start your vehicle shipment with Albatross Auto Shipping now.

Fill out the form.

(865) 730 4992

Phone number in case of anything

The process was smooth and our car pick up and arrival were just as promised. The driver was friendly and communicative. Our transportation agent did a great job and was proactive with communication and details. I'm sold! No more cross country driving for our family - we will be repeat customers for sure!

Repeat Customer

I used this company twice to transport my vehicle from Florida to N.Y. and back. It was a great experience right from the beginning. Also good customer service. Delivery guy was very professional too. Highly recommend!

A Fairly Simple Process

It was a fairly simple process. You speak to someone about posting your car for delivery, give dates available, they find you a trucking company, your car gets shipped. Communication was actually reasonable and through a few phone calls I was able to track the progress of my car.

F.A.Q.

Car shipping at its best with Albatross Auto Shipping. We are here to make your car shipping seamless and stress-free. Whether you're an individual or a corporation, we offer a variety of options to fit your needs, including door-to-door, expedited, open trailer, and enclosed car shipping. With over 40,000 vetted carriers and a commitment to quality, you can trust us to safely and securely transport your vehicle. Our expertise and commitment to quality are reflected in our successful record of shipping over 12,000 vehicles and earning the trust of over 10,000 happy customers.
info@albatrossllc.net

+1 (865) 381 80 15
